name: Exhibition of Art Treasures, Manchester
obverse: Three muses seated surrounded by various objects symbolising the subject of the exhibition.
reverse_inscriptions: EXHIBITION OF ART TREASURES OF THE UNITED KINGDOM OPENED AT MANCHESTER BY HIS ROYAL HIGHNESS PRINCE ALBERT MAY 5TH 1857
description: This medal was made to commemorate the Exhibition of Art Treasures in 1857 in Manchester.
